newsitem.title: UK: EIB sets 300 billion lire five-year bond.
newsitem.headline: EIB sets 300 billion lire five-year bond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by joint lead managers Banque Nationale de Paris, San Paolo and Sanwa.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 101.60 PAY DATE 05.NOV.96
MOODY AAA LISTING LUX PAY FREQ =
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW = HOME CTRY SUPRA TAX PROVS =
NOTES ** GENERAL SELLING RESTRICTIONS WITH SPECIFICATIONS FOR
